value:
$WmMPID_マリアベル,ch04_28_Mariabell_F_Normal,Face|The enemy is scattering! Now's our
chance to end this!$k$p$WmMPID_ソワレ,ch04_15_Soiree_F_Normal,Face|Right—let's get in there and smash
some heads already! CHARGE!$k$p$WmMPID_デジェル,ch04_38_Degel_F_Normal,Face|Hold it! We'll handle things from
here, Mother!$k$p$WmMPID_ブレディ,ch04_36_Bredy_M_Normal,Face|Yeah. We'll make sure they get the
treatment they so sorely need...$k$p$WmMPID_ベルベット,ch04_32_Velvet_F_Normal,Face|And we're to stay back? Why? It'll
be faster for all of us to finish them
off together.$k$p$WmMPID_シャンブレー,ch04_37_Chanbray_M_Normal,Face|M-Mother... Cornered prey lashes
out most violently!$k$pSo, please... Let us take care of
them... E-even if it is...distressing.$k$p$WmMPID_ノノ,ch04_13_Nono_F_Normal,Face|Huh?! No fair! I wanted to play some
more too... I'm coming with!$k$p$WmMPID_ンン,ch04_35_Nn_F_Normal,Face|Mother...the battlefield isn't a
playground, remember? You're
supposed to stay focused!$k$p$WmMPID_デジェル,ch04_38_Degel_F_Normal,Face|We survived the cruel world we
were born into, so we're ready for
whatever this battle has in store.$k$p$WmMPID_ブレディ,ch04_36_Bredy_M_Normal,Face|Even if ya came along, Ma, you'd
all just end up in the way.$k$p$WmMPID_マリアベル,ch04_28_Mariabell_F_Normal,Face|In...the...WAY?! How DARE you!
How rude can you be? Honestly!
...You're sure you're MY son?$k$p$WmMPID_ンン,ch04_35_Nn_F_Normal,Face|If we don't go now, we'll miss our
chance to hit the enemy before they
regroup. Let's go—quickly.$k$p$WmMPID_デジェル,ch04_38_Degel_F_Normal,Face|Mother, please fall back and secure
the rear line. There are sure to be
wounded in need of tending.$k$p$WmMPID_ソワレ,ch04_15_Soiree_F_Normal,Face|H-hey, just hang on a minu— Oh...
They're already gone.$k$p$WmMPID_ノノ,ch04_13_Nono_F_Normal,Face|Ugh! How borrrring! How come I get
left out of all the fun?!$k$p$WmMPID_ベルベット,ch04_32_Velvet_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$Fi1500|Will Brady and his friends be
all right out there, Alfonse?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Brady, Kjelle, and the rest hail from
a different world... It seems they've
come from their parents' future.$k$pBut...even though they are parents
and children, they're all Heroes here.
I imagine it's all...difficult to process.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I guess that's true... But I still think
it'd be better if they'd try working
together a bit more...$k$p
